r_max.description: r_max: maximum rate of cell apoptosis due to viral infection

max_apoptosis_half_max.description: m_apop: viral load at which cells reach half max apoptosis rate

apoptosis_hill_power.description: Hill power for viral load apoptosis response

infected_cell_chemokine_secretion_rate.description: s_Ichemokine: max rate that infected cells secrete chemokine

debris_secretion_rate.description: s_Ddebris: rate that dead cells release debris

infected_cell_chemokine_secretion_activa.description: used internally to track activation of chemokine secretion

TCell_detection.description: protein value at which a T Cell can detect an infected cell

TCell_contact_time.description: tracks total contact time with CD8 T cells

cell_attachment_rate.description: the rate at which the cell attaches to cells in contact

cell_attachment_lifetime.description: the mean duration of a cell-cell attachment

TCell_contact_death_threshold.description: _Iattach: threshold CD8 T cell contact time to trigger apoptosis

max_attachment_distance.description: max distance at which to form a cell-cell attachment

time_to_next_phagocytosis.description: time it takes for the apoptotic material to be phagocytosed

material_internalisation_rate.description: r_internalise: rate material is ingested by phagocyte

threshold_macrophage_volume.description: K_max: Threshold volume for macrophage exhaustion

ability_to_phagocytose_infected_cell.description: Boolean for whether macrophages can phagocytose infected cells

time_of_DC_departure.description: Time DC leaves tissue after activation

phagocytosis_rate.description: rate of phagocytosing a nearby target

sensitivity_to_debris_chemotaxis.description: relative sensitivity to debris in chemotaxis

sensitivity_to_chemokine_chemotaxis.description: relative sensitivity to chemokine in chemotaxis

activated_cytokine_secretion_rate.description: rate of secreting pro-inflamatory cytokine after activation

DC_leaving_not_dying.description: used internally to track activation state

activated_immune_cell.description: flag for whether immune cell is activated or not

antiviral_state.description: flag for whether cell is in antiviral state

antiviral_state_timer.description: Tracks time cell will exit antiviral state (after 24hrs)

eclipse_time.description: Tracks time cell will exit antiviral state (after 24hrs)

antiviral_state.description: flag for whether cell is in antiviral state

antiviral_state_timer.description: Tracks time cell will exit antiviral state (after 24hrs)

eclipse_time.description: Tracks time cell will exit antiviral state (after 24hrs)

immune_dt.description: how often we check to introduce immune cells

immune_z_offset.description: immune cell position over the epithelium

initial_condition_large_tissue.description: Infect center cell with one virion (overrides MOI)

initial_condition_large_tissue_bronchiol.description: Infect center cell with one virion (overrides MOI)

Number_of_virion_arrival_points.description: Number of places viruses arrive in the lungs

number_of_CD8_Tcells.description: initial number of CD8 T cells in tissue

number_of_DCs.description: DC0: initial number of Dendritic Cells

number_of_CD4_Tcells.description: initial number of CD4 Tcells in tissue

perecentage_tissue_vascularized.description: percentage of tissue sitting above blood vessels

color_variable.description: color cells based on this variable

CD8_max_recruitment_rate.description: rCD8recruit: max CD8 recruitment rate (for saturated signal)

CD8_recruitment_min_signal.description: RminCD8: min concentration to attract CD8

CD8_recruitment_saturation_signal.description: RsatCD8: saturating concentration to attract CD8

macrophage_max_recruitment_rate.description: rMrecruit: max macrophage recruitment rate (for saturated signal)

macrophage_recruitment_min_signal.description: RminM: min concentration to attract macrophages

macrophage_recruitment_saturation_signal.description: RsatM: saturating concentration to attract macrophages

neutrophil_max_recruitment_rate.description: rNrecuit: max neutrophil recruitment rate (for saturated signal)

neutrophil_recruitment_min_signal.description: RminN: min concentration to attract neutrophils

neutrophil_recruitment_saturation_signal.description: RsatN: saturating concentration to attract neutrophils

virus_fraction_released_at_death.description: fraction of internal virus released at cell death

gamma.description: gamma: replication rate of virion DNA

u_Evirus.description: uEvirus: epithelial cell uptake rate of virus

virus_fraction_released_after_apoptosis.description: Fraction of virus released after CD8 T cell apoptosis

virions_needed_for_DC_activation.description: Number of virions needed to activate DC

epsilon_distance.description: Multiple of interaction distance for immune cells

phagocytes_virus_uptake_rate.description: Rate that phagocytes uptake virus after activation

Infection_detection_threshold.description: Amount of intracellular virus for phagocyte detection

Death_rates_of_old_Tcells.description: Death rate of old T cells

IC_50_IFN.description: IFN half effect on viral efficacy

IFN_secretion_rate.description: IFN secretion rate from infected cells

v_rep.description: Minimum intracellular virions neccessary for replication
